channel.title: Posts on Tales of a Wandering Software Maker
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tales of a Wandering Software Maker

item.title: "Merging Code"
item.description: Let me tell you about what happened on this one team. Sp there’s Gary, the lead dev, there’s John, product dude, there’s Ginny, mid-level dev, and there’s this new dude who joined a month ago or so, and his name is Low-Key. That team does code reviews and Gary reviews them all. He often asks for changes. At some point Gary is sick and there’s a problem. Low-Key reaches out to Gary and asks for merge rights because Ginny has found the fix and he wants to merge it in.
